text: Huodendron is a genus of four species of flowering plants in the family Styracaceae, native to eastern Asia, from southern China south to Thailand and Vietnam.Flora of China: HuodendronWorld Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998: Huodendron parviflorum The species are small to medium-sized deciduous trees growing to 12–25 m tall. ;Species * Huodendron biaristatum (W.W.Smith) Rehder * Huodendron parviflorum H.L.Li * Huodendron tibeticum (J. Anthony) Rehder * Huodendron tomentosum Y.C.Tang ex S.M.Hwang ==References== Category:Styracaceae Category:Ericales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Huodendron
